gcci.text: H100 pricing at $3.11/hr reflects constrained supply meeting persistent demand, with hyperscalers prioritizing capex efficiency over rapid expansion amid lingering chip shortage concerns.

gtpi.text: Input token pricing at $1.39/1M signals intensified API price compression, driving providers to optimize model efficiency and leverage competitive pricing strategies to capture market share.

gagl.text: Annual load of 120 TWh from AI infrastructure creates unprecedented grid strain, accelerating nuclear adoption discussions while highlighting the critical need for carbon-conscious data center expansion.

aipi.text: Current AI investment velocity suggests frothy sentiment with sustainability concerns, as rapid capacity additions may outpace genuine demand while infrastructure costs create potential bubble risks.
